metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5147 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The libtremor library has the same flaw as CVE-2018-5146. This library is used by Firefox in place of libvorbis on Android and ARM platforms. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.7.2 and Firefox < 59.0.1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5147` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

libvorbisidec1 - 1.0.2+svn18153-1+deb9u1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
libvorbisidec package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.2+svn18153-1+deb9u1').
